channel.title: CVE Feed for thisAAY -- Lazy Mouse
channel.description: The latest CVEs for thisAAY -- Lazy Mouse

item.title: CVE-2022-45482|2024-08-03T14:17:03.568Z -- thisaay -- lazy%20mouse
item.description: Lazy Mouse server enforces weak password requirements and doesn't implement rate limiting, allowing remote unauthenticated users to easily and quickly brute force the PIN and execute arbitrary commands. CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H

item.title: CVE-2022-45481|2024-08-03T14:17:03.565Z -- thisaay -- lazy%20mouse
item.description: The default configuration of Lazy Mouse does not require a password, allowing remote unauthenticated users to execute arbitrary code with no prior authorization or authentication. CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H

item.title: CVE-2022-45483|2024-08-03T14:17:03.644Z -- thisaay -- lazy%20mouse
item.description: Lazy Mouse allows an attacker (in a man in the middle position between the server and a connected device) to see all data (including keypresses) in cleartext. CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N
